classData.comment:
/**
 * Base class for component tooltips
 * @class Neo.tooltip.Base
 * @extends Neo.container.Base
 */
classData.description: Base class for component tooltips
classData.name: Base

classData.comment:
/**
         * @member {String} className='Neo.tooltip.Base'
         * @protected
         */
classData.name: className

classData.comment:
/**
         * @member {String} ntype='tooltip'
         * @protected
         */
classData.name: ntype
baseCls

classData.comment:
/**
         * A reference to the target component which is supposed to show this tooltip on mouseenter
         * @member {String|null} componentId_=null
         */
classData.description: A reference to the target component which is supposed to show this tooltip on mouseenter
classData.name: componentId_

classData.comment:
/**
         * Delegates down to a CSS selector inside the target component
         * @member {String|null} delegate=null
         */
classData.description: Delegates down to a CSS selector inside the target component
classData.name: delegate

classData.comment:
/**
         * The delay in ms before the tooltip gets hidden while hovering the target element.
         * Use null to disable the dismiss logic.
         * @member {Number|null} dismissDelay=10000
         */
classData.description:
The delay in ms before the tooltip gets hidden while hovering the target element.
Use null to disable the dismiss logic.
classData.name: dismissDelay

classData.comment:
/**
         * The dismissDelay task id generated by setTimeout()
         * @member {Number|null} dismissDelayTaskId=null
         * @protected
         */
classData.description: The dismissDelay task id generated by setTimeout()
classData.name: dismissDelayTaskId

classData.comment:
/**
         * The delay in ms before the tooltip gets shown
         * @member {Number|null} hideDelay=400
         */
classData.description: The delay in ms before the tooltip gets shown
classData.name: hideDelay

classData.comment:
/**
         * The showDelay task id generated by setTimeout()
         * @member {Number|null} hideDelayTaskId=null
         * @protected
         */
classData.description: The showDelay task id generated by setTimeout()
classData.name: hideDelayTaskId

classData.comment:
/**
         * The delay in ms before the tooltip gets shown
         * @member {Number|null} showDelay=200
         */
classData.description: The delay in ms before the tooltip gets shown
classData.name: showDelay

classData.comment:
/**
         * The showDelay task id generated by setTimeout()
         * @member {Number|null} showDelayTaskId=null
         * @protected
         */
classData.description: The showDelay task id generated by setTimeout()
classData.name: showDelayTaskId

classData.comment:
/**
         * True prevents the tooltip from hiding while the mouse cursor is above it
         * @member {Boolean|null} stayOnHover_=true
         */
classData.description: True prevents the tooltip from hiding while the mouse cursor is above it
classData.name: stayOnHover_

classData.comment:
/**
         * Shortcut to add a label item
         * @member {String} text_=null
         */
classData.description: Shortcut to add a label item
classData.name: text_

classData.comment:
/**

classData.description: Triggered after the componentId config got changed

classData.comment:

classData.comment:
/**
     * Clears one or multiple setTimeout call(s)
     * @param {String[]|String} timers valid values: dismiss, hide, show
     */
classData.description: Clears one or multiple setTimeout call(s)
classData.name: clearTimeout

classData.comment:
/**

classData.description: Instantly hides the tooltip
classData.name: hide

/**

classData.description: Hides the tooltip using the given hideDelay
